thread.title: Secret hero gives cats funny personalities to help boost adoption (17 Photos)
thread.title_full: Secret hero gives cats funny personalities to help boost adoption (17 Photos)

author: Kayla
title: Secret hero gives cats funny personalities to help boost adoption (17 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
With a little wit and stealth you can take over the world. Or just the Sante D’Or pet adoption center in Los Angeles. 
The hilarious guy behind Obvious Planet trolled the cats in a good way, swapping out their boring name cards with new ones featuring specific personality traits. This is all in an effort to get these cats adopted into good homes. 
This is just one of his many projects where he sneaks funny signs into the real world. I’m not even a cat person, but this stunt made me take a second look at some of these furballs. 2
